recipes.label: <Trade stories with Hakim Tmar>
recipes.startdescription: "Stories? I have collected a few in my 20s... Sometimes I think most I will have left from my education will be stories of an era instantly lost to history."
recipes.description: <Hakim sighs, and his lips curl into a smile. "Allons-y then. To friends departend and times gone by. Once upon a time, while I was studying a summer in New York...">
